form-element.label: Advanced antialiasing
form-element.tooltip: enables advanced anti-aliasing for embedded fonts, which provides greater clarity for small fonts.

form-element.label: Allow soure path overlap
form-element.tooltip: checks if a source-path entry is a subdirectory of another source-path entry. It helps make the package names of MXML components unambiguous.

form-element.label: Compatibility version
form-element.tooltip: specifies a mxml compatibility version. e.g. -compatibility-version=2.0.1

form-element.label: Compute digest (swc only)
form-element.tooltip: writes a digest to the catalog.xml of a library. This is required when the library will be used in the -runtime-shared-libraries-path option.

form-element.label: ContextRoot
form-element.tooltip: path to replace {context.root} tokens for service channel endpoints

form-element.label: Debug
form-element.tooltip: generates a movie that is suitable for debugging

form-element.label: Debug password
form-element.tooltip: the password to include in debuggable SWFs

form-element.label: Default background color
form-element.tooltip: default background color (may be overridden by the application code).

form-element.label: Default frame rate
form-element.tooltip: default frame rate to be used in the SWF.

form-element.label: Defaults css url
form-element.tooltip: defines the location of the default style sheet. Setting this option overrides the implicit use of the defaults.css style sheet in the framework.swc file.

form-element.label: Directory (swc only)
form-element.tooltip: output the library as an open directory instead of a SWC file.

form-element.label: Dump config
form-element.tooltip: creates xml containing the complete compiler config

form-element.label: Externs
form-element.tooltip: a list of symbols to omit from linking when building a SWF.

form-element.label: FlashType
form-element.tooltip: enables FlashType for embedded fonts, which provides greater clarity for small fonts.

form-element.label: Headless server
form-element.tooltip: a flag to set when Flex is running on a server without a display.

form-element.label: Include classes
form-element.tooltip: a list of classes to include in the output SWC.

form-element.label: Include libraries
form-element.tooltip: a list of libraries (SWCs) to completely include in the SWF.

form-element.label: Include lookup only
form-element.tooltip: if true, manifest entries with lookupOnly=true are included in SWC catalog. Default is false.

form-element.label: Include namespaces
form-element.tooltip: all classes in the listed namespaces are included in the output SWC.

form-element.label: Include resource bundles
form-element.tooltip: a list of resource bundles to include in the output SWC.

form-element.label: Include sources
form-element.tooltip: a list of directories and source files to include in the output SWC.

form-element.label: Includes
form-element.tooltip: a list of symbols to always link in when building a SWF.

form-element.label: Incremental
form-element.tooltip: enables incremental compilation.

form-element.label: Isolate styles
form-element.tooltip: enables the compiled application or module to set styles that only affect itself and its children.

form-element.label: Keep all type selectors
form-element.tooltip: disables the pruning of unused CSS type selectors.

form-element.label: Keep as3 metadata
form-element.tooltip: keep the specified metadata in the SWF.

form-element.label: Keep generated ActionScript
form-element.tooltip: save temporary source files generated during MXML compilation.

form-element.label: Link report
form-element.tooltip: Output a XML-formatted report of all definitions linked into the application.

form-element.label: Load config
form-element.tooltip: load a file containing configuration options.

form-element.label: Load externs
form-element.tooltip: an XML file containing def, pre, and ext symbols to omit from linking when building a SWF.

form-element.label: Local font snapshot
form-element.tooltip: File containing system font data produced by flex2.tools.FontSnapshot.

form-element.label: Font managers
form-element.tooltip: Compiler font manager classes, in policy resolution order

form-element.label: Max cached fonts
form-element.tooltip: sets the maximum number of fonts to keep in the server cache. The default value is 20.

form-element.label: Max glyphs per face
form-element.tooltip: sets the maximum number of character glyph-outlines to keep in the server cache for each font face. The default value is 1000.

form-element.label: Metadata contributor
form-element.tooltip: a creator's name to store in the SWF metadata

form-element.label: Metadata date
form-element.tooltip: The creation date to store in the SWF metadata

form-element.label: Metadata description
form-element.tooltip: The default description to store in the SWF metadata.

form-element.label: Metadata language
form-element.tooltip: The language to store in the SWF metadata (i.e. EN, FR).

form-element.label: Metadata publisher
form-element.tooltip: A publisher's name to store in the SWF metadata.

form-element.label: Metadata title
form-element.tooltip: The default title to store in the SWF metadata.

form-element.label: Omit trace statements
form-element.tooltip: toggle whether trace statements are omitted.

form-element.label: Output
form-element.tooltip: the filename of the SWF movie to create

form-element.label: Optimize
form-element.tooltip: Enable post-link SWF optimization

form-element.label: Raw metadata
form-element.tooltip: XML text to store in the SWF metadata (overrides metadata.* configuration)

form-element.label: Resource bundle list
form-element.tooltip: prints a list of resource bundles to a file for input to the compc compiler to create a resource bundle SWC file.

form-element.label: Report invalid styles
form-element.tooltip: enables reporting of invalid styles as warnings.

form-element.label: Runtime shared libraries
form-element.tooltip: a list of runtime shared library URLs to be loaded before the application starts.

form-element.label: Services
form-element.tooltip: Path to Flex Data Services configuration file

form-element.label: Show ActionScript warnings
form-element.tooltip: runs the AS3 compiler in a mode that detects legal but potentially incorrect code

form-element.label: Show binding warnings
form-element.tooltip: toggle whether warnings generated from data binding code are displayed

form-element.label: Show invalid css property warnings
form-element.tooltip: toggle whether invalid css property warnings are reported

form-element.label: Show shadowed device font warnings
form-element.tooltip: toggles whether warnings are displayed when an embedded font name shadows a device font name

form-element.label: Show unused type selector warnings
form-element.tooltip: toggle whether warnings generated from unused CSS type selectors are displayed

form-element.label: Static link RSLs
form-element.tooltip: statically link the libraries specified by the -runtime-shared-libraries-path option.

form-element.label: Target player
form-element.tooltip: specifies the version of the player the application is targeting. Features requiring a later version will not be compiled into the application. The minimum value supported is 9.0.0.

form-element.label: Theme
form-element.tooltip: list of CSS or SWC files to apply as a theme.

form-element.label: Tools locale
form-element.tooltip: specifies the locale used by the compiler when reporting errors and warnings.

form-element.label: Use network
form-element.tooltip: toggle whether the SWF is flagged for access to network resources.

form-element.label: Use resource bundle metadata
form-element.tooltip: determines whether resources bundles are included in the application.

form-element.label: Verbose stacktraces
form-element.tooltip: save callstack information to the SWF for debugging.

form-element.label: Verify digest
form-element.tooltip: verifies the libraries loaded at runtime are the correct ones.

form-element.label: Version
form-element.tooltip: display the build version of the program.

form-element.label: Warn array toString changes
form-element.tooltip: Array.toString() format has changed.

form-element.label: Warn assignment within conditional
form-element.tooltip: Assignment within conditional.

form-element.label: Warn bad array cast
form-element.tooltip: Possibly invalid Array cast operation.

form-element.label: Warn bad bool assignment
form-element.tooltip: Non-Boolean value used where a Boolean value was expected.

form-element.label: Warn bad date cast
form-element.tooltip: Invalid Date cast operation.

form-element.label: Warn bad es3 type method
form-element.tooltip: Unknown method.

form-element.label: Warn bad es3 type prop
form-element.tooltip: Unknown property.

form-element.label: Warn bad nan comparison
form-element.tooltip: Illogical comparison with NaN. Any comparison operation involving NaN will evaluate to false because NaN != NaN.

form-element.label: Warn bad null assignment
form-element.tooltip: Impossible assignment to null.

form-element.label: Warn bad null comparison
form-element.tooltip: Illogical comparison with null.

form-element.label: Warn bad undefined comparison
form-element.tooltip: Illogical comparison with undefined. Only untyped variables (or variables of type *) can be undefined.

form-element.label: Warn bad undefined comparison
form-element.tooltip: Boolean() with no arguments returns false in ActionScript 3.0. Boolean() returned undefined in ActionScript 2.0.

form-element.label: Warn changes in resolve
form-element.tooltip: __resolve is no longer supported.

form-element.label: Warn class is sealed
form-element.tooltip: Class is sealed. It cannot have members added to it dynamically.

form-element.label: Warn const not initialized
form-element.tooltip: Constant not initialized.

form-element.label: Warn constructor returns value
form-element.tooltip: Function used in new expression returns a value. Result will be what the function returns, rather than a new instance of that function.

form-element.label: Warn deprecated event handler error
form-element.tooltip: EventHandler was not added as a listener.

form-element.label: Warn deprecated function error
form-element.tooltip: Unsupported ActionScript 2.0 function.

form-element.label: Warn deprecated property error
form-element.tooltip: Unsupported ActionScript 2.0 property.

form-element.label: Warn duplicate argument names
form-element.tooltip: More than one argument by the same name.

form-element.label: Warn duplicate variable def
form-element.tooltip: Duplicate variable definition

form-element.label: Warn for var in changes
form-element.tooltip: ActionScript 3.0 iterates over an object's properties within a "for x in target" statement in random order.

form-element.label: Warn import hides class
form-element.tooltip: Importing a package by the same name as the current class will hide that class identifier in this scope.

form-element.label: Warn instanceOf changes
form-element.tooltip: Use of the instanceof operator.

form-element.label: Warn internal error
form-element.tooltip: Internal error in compiler.

form-element.label: Warn level not supported
form-element.tooltip: _level is no longer supported. For more information, see the flash.display package.

form-element.label: Warn missing namespace decl
form-element.tooltip: Missing namespace declaration (e.g. variable is not defined to be public, private, etc.).

form-element.label: Warn negative uint literal
form-element.tooltip: Negative value will become a large positive value when assigned to a uint data type.

form-element.label: Warn no constructor
form-element.tooltip: Missing constructor.

form-element.label: Warn no explicit super call in constructor
form-element.tooltip: The super() statement was not called within the constructor.

form-element.label: Warn no type decl
form-element.tooltip: Missing type declaration.

form-element.label: Warn number from string changes
form-element.tooltip: In ActionScript 3.0, white space is ignored and '' returns 0. Number() returns NaN in ActionScript 2.0 when the parameter is '' or contains white space.

form-element.label: Warn scoping change in this
form-element.tooltip: Change in scoping for the this keyword. Class methods extracted from an instance of a class will always resolve this back to that instance. In ActionScript 2.0 this is looked up dynamically based on where the method is invoked from.

form-element.label: Warn slow text field addition
form-element.tooltip: Inefficient use of += on a TextField.

form-element.label: Warn unlikely function value
form-element.tooltip: Possible missing parentheses.

form-element.label: Warn xml class has changed
form-element.tooltip: Possible usage of the ActionScript 2.0 XML class.

form-element.label: Warnings
form-element.tooltip: toggle the display of warnings
